current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To enhance Social Security benefits for children, divorced spouses, and widows and widowers, and
			 for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Retirement and Income Security Enhancements (RAISE) Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Retirement and Income Security Enhancements (RAISE) Act

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the
The table of contents for this Act is as follows:

toc-entry.#text: Sec. 1. Short title; table of contents.
Sec. 2. Improving benefits for divorced spouses, widows, widowers, and surviving divorced spouses.
Sec. 3. Extended benefit eligibility for children who are full-time students.
Sec. 4. Establishment of payroll surtax for high-income individuals.
Sec. 5. Inclusion of surplus earnings in social security benefit formula.
